column4: Hi. I just nmap'd my machine and found port 25 open. I had a quick look on the Ubuntu forum but it's not obvious why this port is open. I can telnet to it, also
No, that's why I don't understand why it is open
you there, i got sidetracked by an idiot
are you running any mail programs right now?
kill the process and see if the system is still ok, you can always reboot
hmm, id look into evolutons config
but i dont use any email clients but i can help narrow stuff down
